item.description:
Happy Halloween Packers,

Hopefully this weekend will be a treat for the PACK and we will move to 6 – 3 on the season with the Arizona Cardinals coming to Lambeau Field at 1.00pm on Sunday. The 4 – 4 Cardinals are on the road plus a short week after being crushed by San Francisco last Monday night. This is a must win for both teams with some though opponents coming up on the schedule. As usual we will be meeting on the 2nd floor of The Banshee, please advise me if you need to do anything better for the group, all suggestions or comments are welcome. Enjoy your “Trick or Treating” tonight and have a great week.

GO PACK

Ray Butler

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Arizona at Lambeau Field
